      • addMusic

        void addMusic(MusicMetadata music,
              String path,
              ShareStatus shareStatus)
       throws FileNotFoundException
        Add new local music to the current owner and to the local list and shares it.
        Parameters:
        music - New music metadata
        path - Path of local mp3
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - Throws if MP3 file doesn't exist

      • createUser

        void createUser(LocalUser user)
         throws IOException,
                LoginException
        Check if there is a config.properties file in the user's save path. If there is no config file yet, create a config.properties file by copy of default-config.properties default-config.properties is located in resources/ Then the function is calling Login.run function by giving the Datacore object and the LocalUser
        Parameters:
        user - LocalUser given by IHM
        Throws:
        IOException
        LoginException

      • exportProfile

        void exportProfile(Path path)
            throws IOException
        Backup the current LocalUser, its musics and its avatar.
        Parameters:
        path - path to the directory that will contain the backup.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem creating or deleting any file.

      • importProfile

        void importProfile(Path pathToBackup,
                   Path newSavePath)
            throws IOException,
                   DataException
        Import a previously exported LocalUser.
        Parameters:
        pathToBackup - the path to the backup directory.
        newSavePath - the new savePath for the imported LocalUser.
        Throws:
        IOException - if it is not possible to read a file.
        DataException - if the username already exists.
